name: DeathGameTycoon
description:
„Game Death Tycoon“ is a 2D-Pixelart Development Simulation.  Your task is to finish a game within the given time, with a given ressource of workers developing it.

The developing workers are the life of your gaming company. Stressing them out too much, kills more and more workers until noone is left to create the game.

With this, we want to send out a message to everyone. Messing with developers lifetime, is equal to messing with their health. We want to wake people up and rethink their decision about pushing and punishing games and their developers. Because doing so, drives the developers in doing unhealthy decisions and breaks the flow and creativity of the game YOU want. So give them time and let them finish YOUR game, to enjoy it in a complete state and made with love.

Creativity takes time. Give it to them.

==============================================================

How To Play:

 

Time is running against you. Be careful, time is limited.

The Publisher likes your idea and you started to create your game. Finish it before your time runs out.

Beside the company, workers have a private life. Too much stress lets them take bad decision.

Your workers are not exchangeable, keep them alive!

Use the room abilities to boost your workers. They might have a bad component.
